author: AlexHimself
body:
# Integrate into PowerShell ISE

Have PowerShell 7 install update the PowerShell ISE as well.

$PSVersionTable.PSVersion does not output version 7 in the ISE.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: ISE was deprecated long time ago. Please use VS Code with PowerShell extension.

comments.author: rjmholt
comments.body:
> ISE was deprecated long time ago

Just to be clear, the ISE is not deprecated. But it isn't receiving any significant updates.

The nature of the ISE prevents it from being made to work with PS 7 easily.

We'll be releasing a big update to the PowerShell extension for VSCode soon to go with the PS 7 release.

title: Feature Request - Update/include ISE for PS7
